titles.title: Providing for a correction to the enrollment of H.R. 6233.

action.text: Mr. Young (AK) asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/30/2006--Passed House without amendment. Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to correct the enrollment of H.R. 6233 (making technical corrections to the Safe, Accountable, Flexible, Efficient Transportation Equity Act: A Legacy for Users or SAFETEA-LU) by eliminating a provision directing the Secretary of Transportation to make funds available for the construction of a bus facility for the Livermore Amador Valley Transit Authority in Livermore, California.
